Report title: Mortality in Local Jails, 2000-2007  NCJ 222988
Table 6. Special inmate counseling and psychiatric services, by size of jail jurisdiction, 1999
Note: Data are the most recent available from the Census of Jails 1999, BJS Web, 1 September 2001. Suicide prevention program items were not included in the more recent 2006 Census of Jails.
*Based on the average daily population (ADP) in 12 months ending June 30, 1999.
